article.headline: Oral Roberts 71, Centenary 62
article.story: SHREVEPORT, La. (AP) -- Robert Jarvis had 19 points and Oral Roberts scored all nine points in overtime to beat Centenary 71-62 on Saturday. Adam Liberty added 16 points for Oral Roberts (8-5, 3-0 Summit) and Marcus Lewis 11. Shawn King had a game-high eight rebounds for the Golden Eagles, which led 40-35 at halftime. Nick Stallings had 23 points for the Gents (7-8, 1-2) and Tyrone Hamilton 20. The Golden Eagles never led by more than nine points, and Centenary tied the game at 47- and 59-all. With the score tied at 62-62 and 46 seconds left, Oral Roberts' Yemi Ogunoye missed a pair of free throws. But the Gents were unable to get a good shot and Tyrone Hamilton missed an off-balance three-point attempt. Centenary turned the ball over on four straight possessions in overtime and a season-high 26 times overall, leading to 29 points for the visitors.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
